text:
Hey Connor, 
I hope your doing well. My name is Tom, I’m currently studying Computer Character Animation at Teesside University and hope to become a modeller within the VFX industry. I’m really hoping to get more of a grounded understanding of what’s expected from graduates on their first position within the industry, how I can stand out from the crowd when developing my showreel as well as some industry insights.
Best regards,
Tom.
